short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: O3 Wallet is a simple Bitcoin wallet that supports four types addresses (Taproot, Native Segwit, Nested Segwit, Legacy)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: O3 Wallet is a simple open-source Bitcoin wallet that supports the creation of four types of wallet addresses (Taproot, Native Segwit, Nested Segwit, Legacy), and allows users to select UTXOs for asset transactions. It is a minimalist wallet management tool.
